data.text:
Turn your Mac into a Kindle with the free Kindle app, and carry all your Kindle books with you, wherever you go.

Kindle books (including those with narration) that you have purchased on Amazon will automatically appear in your app.

What youâll get:

â¢ Sample any Kindle book for free

â¢ Magazines, newspapers, graphic novels and textbooks with high-res colour images

â¢ A customisable reading experience with your choice of font style, size and more

â¢ Comfortable reading day and night with adjustable screen brightness and page colour

â¢ Unique features like X-Ray, Whispersync, Page Flip, Print Replica, flashcards and more

â¢ Instant translations and definitions, without leaving the page

â¢ Ability to make and share in-page highlights

â¢ Bold font and text size options

â¢ Access to Kindle books that may be available in your local library.

By using this app, you agree to Amazonâs Conditions of Use (www.amazon.co.uk/conditionsofuse). Please see our Privacy Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/privacynotice), our Cookies Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/cookies) and our Interest-Based Ads Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/interestbasedads).
